original_text: And he shall pass through the sea with affliction, and shall smite the waves in the sea, and all the deeps of the river shall dry up: and the pride of Assyria shall be brought down, and the sceptre of Egypt shall depart away.
korean_text: 내가 그들이 고난의 바다를 지나갈 때에 바다 물결을 치리니 나일의 깊은 곳이 다 마르겠고 앗수르의 교만이 낮아지겠고 애굽의 규가 없어지리라

sentences.original_text: And he shall pass through the sea with affliction
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 환난을 받으며 바다를 지나갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall smite the waves in the sea
and all the deeps of the river shall dry up
sentences.korean_translation: 강의 모든 깊은 곳이 마를 것이라

sentences.original_text: and the pride of Assyria shall be brought down
and the sceptre of Egypt shall depart away
